message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price, and I'm confident you'll be pleased with it.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling it for $12,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $12,000 is below the lowest price I can accept.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $13,000?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I would like to counter with an offer of $12,500. This is my final offer.
